Message:
The first act was
Hathor and Mimi’s dance!

Then came Asahi’s
aerial acrobatics show,
followed by Tropon’s juggling!

Using fire and ice,
we put on a show
only we could provide,
and the audience
was going wild.
Finally, to top things off...
“Let’s close this out, Flack!”

We fired our guns
at the same time.

Each bullet
collided into another,
splattering paint
all over the stage.

But, surely that wasn’t enough
to satisfy the audience, right?

We both leapt into the air.
This was a tough trick
that required us to be
in perfect sync to pull off.
But for us, it was easy-peasy!

As we crossed paths mid-air,
we tossed our guns to each other.

Upon landing at the same time,
standing back-to-back...
Bang!

A final splash of paint spattered,
completing our beautiful
field of colorful flowers~♪

Amidst the thunderous
applause and cheers,
we gracefully took a bow.
“We did it, Flack!”
While we were mid-high-five,

a group of kids from
the crowd ran up to us...

“Huh? You guys wanna
join the circus too?

Sure, why not?
Sounds like fun to me!
C’mon, step right up!”

As soon as I called out to them,
all the kids rushed onto the stage.

It’ll be your first time being
part of a show like this, huh?
Well, there’s nothing to it!
As long as you’re having a blast,
that’s all that counts!

“Gather ’round, everyone!
Let’s have some fun!”
